__e: Max, things sure are dull around here without you. Everyone walking around all P.C., nobody called me black. Hell.
Cute, but my point is in order for me to be p.c., I gotta take the floor.
So you only want me to be honest if it's politically correct?
We never agreed politically, but we had a lot of fun.
It's not PC but it's the truth.
No, that would be racially insensitive of me to think that!
